paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information, including penetrance data and individual records.

functional_data.summary: Most BRCA2 mutations were frameshift mutations except for a previously unreported nonsense mutation, c.19G>T, and one splice variant, c.631+1G>A.

variants.segregation_data: This mutation has been previously reported as a germline variant in hereditary breast OC syndrome and observed in multiple ethnicities.
variants.additional_notes: The BRCA2 mutation c.6486_6489del was identified in 4 samples from unrelated patients, accounting for 31% of all BRCA2 mutations.
key_quotes: The BRCA2 mutation c.6486_6489del was identified in 4 samples from unrelated patients, thereby accounting for 31% of all BRCA2 mutations.

functional_data.summary: This mutation was thought to result in abnormal mRNA splicing.

key_quotes: Most BRCA2 mutations were frameshift mutations except for a previously unreported nonsense mutation, c.19G>T.

functional_data.summary: Biochemical analysis revealed a similar mutation at this splice donor site that was found to be deleterious by Myriad Genetics laboratories.

variants.additional_notes: This mutation was thought to result in abnormal mRNA splicing.
key_quotes: Most BRCA2 mutations were frameshift mutations except for a previously unreported nonsense mutation, c.19G>T, and one splice variant, c.631+1G>A, which were thought to result in abnormal mRNA splicing.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted from the main text.
